name: Terrorize the Terrorists
description:
I made this game because I play Counter Strike Global Offensive. Defeat 50 Terrorist to unlock the boss. The goal is to defeat the Boss after killing the puny terrorists. WASD to aim. Space to shoot. Simple as that :D

Final Project for FSU Game Design WorkShop

PostMortem-

The game mechanics IMO were very easy to implement 

Everything went right after everything went wrong.

First time i implemented the boss. It spawned with the 100 Terrorist. But 100 At the size of the B0ss. Not realizing it. It crashed my computer and i had to restart because my computer froze.

The destroy script wouldnt work for some reason and nothing was getting destroyed expect the Terrorists were destroying eachother.
